title: Uniform Works
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: uniform_works
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Uniform Works. The average
  contract duration was 0.47 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $196.4K. The longest
  contract was 2.77 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.8M.
lookup_name: 'UNIFORM WORKS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '17'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '6%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-48%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-107.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.47'
s421_mean_contract_value: '196.4K'
s425_max_duration: '2.77'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.8M'
---
